Organizations & Factions

A

The Arcane Empire

The current monarchy of the [continent].

C

The Church of the Phoenix

A religion based upon the rebirth and warrior spirit of the Phoenix. The Church of the Phoenix celebrate the Phoenix on the 22nd day (The 3rd Quarter moon) of Hearthglow. In some regions the Church is nothing more than a cult, and who try to bring forth the glory of the Phoenix to their plane of existence. This usually results in a catastrophic event wiping out entire nations or worse.

The Claret Society

An organization who practices the dark arts.

The Covenant of the One God

A religion based upon the theory of there being only one true god. This is a small religion usually only found in large cities.

D

The Dominion of Solara

An opposing kingdom to the far [direction] who is bent on invading and conquering all land.

F

The Flesh Consortium

A wide slavery ring with hubs around the [continent] and beyond.

O

The Obsidian Syndicate

An underground organizations that employs spies, thieves and the less reputable individuals to covertly reach their agenda.

  • Trevan Vanillastone
  • Avyne

The Order of the Aegis

A political faction that is anti-magic and opposes the current Arcane Empire regime.

The Order of the Twilight Mistress

A religious cult who worships the Mistress Nocturna of the Umbra Plane.

S

The Sanctum of the Divine Assembly

A religion based upon the worship of the many gods that reside on the divine plane.

V

The Vanguard Institute

An elite organization of adventurers.
